channel.title: Api on Dan Frakes
channel.description: Recent content in Api on Dan Frakes

item.title: API Hacking
item.description: In preparation for a Spartan Sprint in 2016, I subscribed to their “Workout of the Day.” I wanted to pull it up on my phone without having to go to their website or search through my inbox, so I took a closer look at the Workout of the Day web page and found an API link I might be able to use. You shouldn’t have to wait 13 seconds and download 10 MB of ads, images, and popups just to view 630 bytes of text.
